Zero Dark Thirty is a compelling and gritty depiction of the decade-long manhunt for Osama bin Laden. Its gripping story and stellar cast, led by a remarkable Simon Abkarian, make it an unforgettable cinematic experience.

If you're looking for something more lighthearted, Disaster Movie is a fast-paced and humorous exploration of natural disasters and their aftermath. It features an impressive cast of Ike Barinholtz and Carmen Electra.

Where We Belong is a powerful and inspiring story about a street hustler who finds redemption through boxing. It's a captivating coming-of-age tale with a memorable cast led by Chris Eigeman.
